title: Grand Designs 'curse' hits as companies selling the TV show's dream go bust
text:
In a case of life imitating art, companies run by Grand Designs frontman Kevin McCloud have collapsed after hitting money problems – leaving dozens of investors facing heavy losses.

Mr McCloud’s television series has run since 1999 following families as they design and build their dream homes, often using novel materials and groundbreaking architecture in unusual locations.

However, the shows frequently highlight projects running into trouble as budgets spiral out of control and delays push back the move-in date.

Now it seems what some call the "Grand Designs curse" has come home to roost.
